description:
Neil has fallen for Lily. On the weekend, Lily invites Neil to a picnic outside the city. He thought they would be alone, but the other tenants of 1031 were also invited. But then werewolves, demons, vampires, and mummies arrive to destroy Neil and the Demon King residing inside him. At last, the Demon King awakens...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seisakuhi wa Zenbu: Zenkai to Konkai ni Tsugikomimashita
The Entire Production Budget Was Used for Last Episode and This One
制作经费都用在了上一集和这一集
制作費は全部 前回と今回につぎ込みました
